question_stem:
The mosaicplot below visualises a contingency table of two variables:

Whether or not a patient had High Blood Pressure (HBP = 1 means the patient suffered from High Blood Pressure), and
Whether or not the patient died during follow-up (1 means the patient died).


Mosaic plot: HBP vs. Death

The data comes from the UCI dataset of our topic on categorical data analysis.
Which of the following can we infer from the chart?
